attributes.action: Support Anti Bullying Legislation and Safe Schools for All Children including those affected by autism.
attributes.additional_details:
Every Local Authority needs comprehensive anti bullying laws that :have clear definition of bullying and harrassment of pupils and students
Training for Teachers, Teaching Assistants and all school staff.
Investigation protocols for all reported incidents
School staff coordinators dedicated to combatting bullying of all children including those with a diagnosis of autism.
Training for all students and pupils about bullying and harrassment
We must protect every child in every Local Authority including those children with a diagnosis of autism.
